sources.title: The Farmer Takes a Wife (1935)
sources.description: A farmer tries to convince a girl to leave her life on  a canal boat to live with him on his farm. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-farmer-takes-a-wife-1935/

metadata.Plot: Charming love story set on the Erie Canal in the mid-19th Century. A farmer works on the canal to earn money to buy a farm. He meets a cook on a canal boat, but she can't even consider leaving the exciting life on the canal for a banal one on a farm...
metadata.Writer: Walter D. Edmonds, Marc Connelly, Frank B. Elser
metadata.Actors: Janet Gaynor, Henry Fonda, Charles Bickford
